qas.question: After its April departure, when did the torch return to China?
What actor attended a torch celebration in China?
When did the torch reach Sanya, Hainan?
When was the last time the torch had been in China?
Which actor also attended the celebrations?

context: China: The torch returned to China for the first time since <a3_0>April.<a3_0/> The torch arrived in Sanya, Hainan on <a0_0><a2_0>May 4<a2_0/><a0_0/> with celebrations attended by International Olympic Committee (<a4_0>IOC<a4_0/>) officials and Chinese big names like <a1_0><a5_0>Jackie Chan<a1_0/>.<a5_0/> The entire relay through Mainland China was largely a success with many people welcoming the arrival of the torch along the way.
